name: Chaturanga
desc: A four-player variant of chess made for Android. I was introduced to the game by one of my high school wrestling teammates. This was my first project in Unity, and while the game may still have a few bugs and screen size compatibility issues, I'm still pleased with it.

name: Coin Flip Simulator
desc: A rudimentary, text-based JavaFX application that can simulate coin flips and keep a tally of the total heads and tails flipped. It is a very small and simple application I just threw together for fun.

name: Press The Button
desc: A simple JavaFX game that tasks the player to press the on-screen button 10 times as quickly as possible. After each press the buttn will be relocated to a random position. After 10 presses the player's final time is displayed. I've only been able to get as low as 7 seconds, try your hand and see if you can beat me.
